name: Tic Tac Robot
description:
For the robot (it was on blender, so I had to adapt it a lot, I mostly used it as concept): https://www.blendswap.com/blend/18810

For the environment (a pack I bought long time ago but never used so I thought it was the moment): https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/sci-fi-facility-116...

For the human in water: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/post-apocaliptic-s...
